section.title: Administration overview
section.para: A workbench is structured with Organization Units, VFS repositories and projects:

section.title: Organizational unit
section.para: Organization units are useful to model departments and divisions.
An organization unit can hold multiple repositories.

section.title: VFS repository
section.para: A VFS repository is a Virtual File System repository. By default a VFS is a Git repository.
A repository can hold multiple projects and belongs to 1 organization unit.
A new repository can be created from scratch or cloned from an existing repository.
